MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA21 postcode area of Saltcoats. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:05pm due to an underground cable fault outside 188 High Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:40pm on Thursday, 08 April 2021
